CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: INV opens the door and MOT and CHI enter room
CHI bends down to pick up toy car
MOT bends down next to CHI
CHI plays with toy car on floor
< .1-1 .> CHI rolls the car on the floor
<bef> CHI picks up toy duck and stands up
CHI looks at the toy as he squeezes it
CHI bends down to play with jack+in+the+box
CHI put the jack+in+the+box in front of MOT
CHI puts his hand on the handle
CHI attempts to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI jerks on the handle quickly
CHI continues to turn handle of jack+in+the+box
CHI stands up and pushes the jack+in+the+box towards MOT
CHI pushes clown back into box
CHI starts to take his hand out of the box
<bef> MOT assists CHI in closing top
MOT watches as CHI turns handle
CHI stops playing with the jack+in+the+box stands up
CHI starts playing with the toy car
CHI plays with toy car and stands up
CHI points to something on or near table
CHI turns his back to the camera
CHI looks around at the toys on the floor
CHI bends down and picks up toy football
CHI takes a few steps and then throws the football against the door
MOT retrieves ball and pushes it towards CHI
<$=1> MOT holds football out for CHI to take
CHI reaches out and takes football from MOT
CHI tosses ball against wall behind him and then walks over to play with jack+in+the+box
CHI looks down at toy car
CHI turns to play with toy car then looks around room
CHI pushes car across the floor
CHI gets up and looks at the car
CHI bends down and picks up car
MOT turns wheels of car with fingers
CHI steps back and hops from foot to foot
MOT turns car right side up holding it in the air in front of CHI
CHI turns away from MOT to face wall
MOT holds car in front of her
CHI bends down to play with the jack+in+the+box
CHI sits down on rug and squeezes the toy duck
CHI extends arm with toy duck towards MOT
CHI drops and picks up toy duck then continues to squeeze it
CHI shakes the duck . <aft> CHI puts toy duck in his mouth
CHI shakes head violently with the duck still in his mouth
CHI accidentally drops toy out of mouth
CHI puts his hand up to his mouth
MOT picks up toy and squeaks it
MOT places toy in front of CHI
CHI reaches out and points to eye on toy
<$=2> MOT leans back and looks at CHI
<aft> CHI throws toy off to the side
CHI stands up and walks over to the stool and puts one foot on it
CHI reaches for chair for support
MOT helps CHI stand on stool
CHI gets down off of stool
CHI wheels chair away from table
CHI wheels chair back and forth
CHI continues to roll chair back and forth
MOT moves jack+in+the+box out of the way
CHI pushes the chair in and attempts to sit in it
MOT smiles as she watches CHI
CHI sits in chair and gets foot caught
CHI sits in the chair and releases his foot
CHI slaps hands down on table top
CHI looks over shoulder to file cabinet
CHI pushes chair up to table
CHI pushes the chair into the table as far as it could go
MOT pulls out chair for CHI
CHI turns around to face MOT
CHI points at door and walks towards it
CHI turns to look at MOT
MOT extends ball out to CHI
CHI watches ball roll across the floor
CHI continues to stand over by door
<bef> MOT points to book on floor
CHI reaches for doorknob and looks for MOT
CHI lays down on floor next to MOT
MOT turns the handle of the jack+in+the+box
CHI looks at MOT playing with jack+in+the+box
CHI pushes his head on the floor and doesn't look up at MOT
<$=1> MOT pushes the clown with her finger
CHI turns head away from MOT
CHI is still on laying stomach on floor next to MOT
<bef> MOT slides the jack+in+the+box closer to CHI
CHI puts face down on top of his hands
CHI lays on floor and will not look at MOT
MOT squeaks toy in front of CHI
MOT shakes toy by CHI's head
CHI gets up on knees and reaches the toy
MOT squeaks toy in front of CHI and then hands it to him
CHI takes the toy duck and then lays down on floor with toy underneath him
MOT reaches to remove toy from CHI's hand
CHI shifts but remains on top of the toy
MOT takes CHI off the floor
MOT puts CHI on her lap
CHI sits on MOT lap holding toy
CHI looks down at the toy
INV enters room and then leaves while Small Scale activity takes place . INV re-enters the room at 11:16:04 .
INV explains Forbidden Object task to MOT while CHI sits on MOT's lap . INV clears the other toys off the table and gives CHI the beads to hold on to .
INV goes to open the drawer
INV has to release the lock on the desk drawer
CHI looks at the object and reaches for it
INV sets the object on the table
INV sets the object into motion
MOT turns her head and looks at CHI
INV moves the brush toy on the table in front of CHI
CHI grabs the brush toy in front of him
CHI throws his head back and looks at the object
<bef> MOT pats CHI to comfort him
CHI watches the INV put the object in the drawer
INV explains PCI boxes to MOT . MOT carries CHI over to the floor and puts him down .
CHI and MOT get up from chair to play on floor
CHI holds arms up to MOT
MOT places box with ball on floor in front of CHI
MOT takes ball out of box to hold it up in front of CHI
CHI looks at ball MOT is holding then at door
MOT pushes the box away from her
MOT tosses ball into the box
CHI turns himself around to sit in MOT lap
MOT reaches for ball in the box
CHI sits down on MOT's lap
MOT touches the ball but leaves it in the box
CHI looks at ball in the box
CHI shakes head no and looks away from ball
MOT picks up box to shake ball out
CHI gets up off of MOT's lap and goes to the desk drawer where the forbidden object is
CHI points to drawer where forbidden object is stored
CHI kneels in front of cabinet to open drawer where object is
MOT picks up ball to show CHI
CHI looks at ball then at MOT
MOT bounces ball on floor in front of CHI
MOT rolls ball over to CHI
CHI kneels forward and places head on floor in distress
MOT reaches for ball that has rolled beside CHI
CHI watches MOT reach for ball
MOT rolls ball to herself and holds it
CHI gets up on his knees
CHI reaches for corner of table to stand up
MOT holds ball out to CHI
MOT puts the ball in the box and puts it away
CHI is under table out of camera view
<bef> MOT gets the next box and puts it on the floor in front of CHI
CHI stands up and moves toward box
MOT starts to open the box
CHI moves closer to the box
MOT looks up at CHI and smiles
CHI watches MOT take towel out of box
MOT takes towel out of box
MOT looks over towel at CHI
CHI turns away from MOT and bends over
CHI stands up to look at the empty box
MOT puts towel around CHI's shoulder
CHI turns shoulders to remove towel
MOT puts towel in front of CHI
MOT holds towel in front of CHI
CHI looks down and points to something on floor
CHI moves object toward him on the rug
CHI looks up at MOT and holds speck of paper in front of his face
MOT looks at CHI over the top of the cloth
CHI moves behind towel with MOT and holds one end of the towel
MOT puts arms around CHI to hold up towel
CHI slides down onto MOT's lap
MOT puts towel on CHI's lap
MOT tries to lift the towel up
CHI holds towel down on lap
MOT holds towel up in front of CHI
CHI shakes head no and pushes towel away
MOT folds towel in front of CHI
MOT starts to fold the towel
MOT finishes folding towel and drops it to floor
CHI reaches to his left to get box
MOT puts CHI on the floor
CHI slides off of MOT lap to sit next to box on floor
CHI attempts to open box with one hand
MOT opens the box for CHI
MOT holds towel up for CHI to put in box
MOT holds towel out in front of CHI
MOT puts towel in box and closes it
CHI reaches out for box and pushes it away
MOT reaches for box and takes it away
MOT reaches for another box on top of cabinet
CHI turns himself around on the floor to watch MOT
MOT holds box and looks at CHI
MOT hands the book to CHI
CHI reaches out for book and takes it from MOT
CHI stands up with book in hand
CHI walks over to sit in MOT lap
MOT puts empty box on top of cabinet
MOT looks down at book over CHI's shoulder
CHI looks at pictures in book
MOT continues to look at book over CHI shoulder
MOT reaches in front of CHI to pick up book
MOT holds book open in front of CHI
CHI looks down at picture MOT points to
MOT points to one or two images in the picture
CHI points at something on opposite page
CHI turns book around to front cover to look again
MOT points to cover of book
CHI opens the book on his lap
CHI looks down at pictures in book
CHI closes book between his knees
CHI looks to where MOT is pointing
CHI puts book on floor then replaces it on his lap
CHI looks at picture of kitty in book
CHI places his hand on the page
CHI turns on MOT lap to hand her the book
MOT opens book in front of CHI
CHI points to something in the picture
CHI points to something on opposite page
CHI points to picture of dog then to picture of kitty
CHI smiles while continuing to point to picture
CHI makes open and close gesture with hands and looks at picture smiling
CHI looks down at pictures in book
CHI turns attention to picture of cat and then points to picture of dog
CHI looks down at picture in book
CHI looks up into MOT face
CHI watches as MOT turns page
CHI continues to look at page
MOT points to something in picture
CHI looks to where MOT is pointing
MOT flips page back and forth
MOT points to picture of cow
MOT reaches for box on top of cabinet
MOT opens box to put book in
CHI watches MOT put book in box
MOT moves box with book away from CHI
MOT gets up on knees to reach another box
CHI stands up while MOT gets new box
CHI watches as MOT reaches for box
MOT places new box on floor in front of CHI
CHI watches MOT as she opens the new box
MOT removes the cover of the box
CHI bends down and picks up a crayon
CHI walks over to table with crayon
MOT holds up a piece of paper
MOT reaches over to place paper on table
CHI holds out hand to assist MOT with paper
MOT pulls CHI close to her
CHI points to paper on the table
MOT takes the paper off of the table
MOT gets box top to use as desk . MOT places paper on box top for CHI to draw
CHI continues to color then stops
CHI begins to color again vigorously
CHI sits back to look at crayon then at drawing
CHI sits back again to look at crayon then picture
CHI reaches down to slide paper closer to himself
CHI's crayon slides off paper onto box then he returns it to the paper and begins to draw
CHI pushes the paper around and draws
CHI starts to draw on top of the box
CHI goes back to drawing on paper
CHI looks down at the paper
CHI holds crayon with both hands to look at it
MOT looks around for ball while still holding the box top
MOT looks for box with towel in it then looks down at CHI
CHI moves crayon around in his hands
MOT points to box with ball in it
CHI holds his hand out for MOT to see
<bef> MOT drops CHI drawing into box
MOT holds CHI hand and looks at it then reaches for crayon
CHI continues to hold onto crayon
MOT reaches over to move box closer to CHI
CHI looks at box with paper in it
MOT reaches across CHI to take crayon from CHI
CHI holds onto crayon while scratching MOT's wrist with his other hand
MOT pulls on crayon CHI is holding
CHI now holds crayon with both hands
CHI scrapes crayon with his fingernail
CHI looks down on his lap then brushes off crayon shavings
MOT helps CHI brush off crayon shavings
CHI looks over shoulder up at the door
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper . INV enters room
